titleStmt.title: The Princess Anne of Denmark's letter to the Queen
titleStmt.author: Anne, Queen of Great Britain, 1665-1714.
Mary, of Modena, Queen, consort of James II, King of England, 1658-1718.

notesStmt.note: Princess Anne of Denmark = the future Queen Anne of Great Britain; the Queen = Mary of Modena, consort of James II.
In this edition line 11 of text ends "other"; line 19 ends "fully".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
